item.title: Catherine add a quote by E. L. Konigsburg
item.description: "The adventure is over. Everything gets over, and nothing is ever enough. Except the part you carry with you. It's the same as going on a vacation. Some people spend all their time on a vacation taking pictures so that when they get home they can show their friends evidence that they had a good time. They don't pause to let the vacation enter inside of them and take that home." -- E. L. Konigsburg

item.title: Catherine add a quote by Robert Downey Jr.
item.description: "Listen, smile, agree, and then do whatever the fuck you were gonna do anyway." -- Robert Downey Jr.
